metadata.title: CVE-2024-21820 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect default permissions in some Intel(R) Xeon(R) processor memorycontroller configurations when using Intel(R) SGX may allow a privilegeduser to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'trusty doesn't support late loading of microcode').
